cooked: Right, the reason is that I tried to write a post and being a new user I couldn’t include more than one piece of media, so this is a work in progress for now while the writeup currently lives at https://valuedmammal.github.io/. In short, this “score” is the fraction of block tx data in a newly confirmed block that was expected by the node’s recent block template.
